storyInfo: Robin finds herself vexed because she hasn't been able to get used to life aboard Rhodes Island. One day, she finds an injured cloudbeast while on a mission...

attributes.content: We've reached the destination, and the surrounding area is cleared. Signal's... clear. Now establishing communications linkâ€”
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: This is Robin. The communications station has been established. Now attempting connection. Lighthouse, Lighthouse. Please answer if you read.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: This is Lighthouse. The signal is normal. I can hear you loud and clear.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Now testing. 'All quiet on Rhodes Island.' Please read back.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: 'All quiet on Rhodes Island.'
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Confirmed communications have been established.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Robin, did you learn all your secret codes from movies?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: And battle records...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: They sound kind of... cool.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Haha, that's true. They are pretty cool.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Our mission today is to establish the communications network around the landship. Yours is the last node. Everybody else has already gone on back. Once you're back, we'll head back to the landship.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Right, it'll still be pretty early by the time we get back. How about we all have a meal at the cafeteria together?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Uhh...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: There's no need to be shy. It's just the operators on this mission today.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: (Whispers) Hm? This picked up a new biosignal nearby.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: (Whispers) It's very weak, but it should be around here.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Oh myâ€”
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: (Weak howl)
attributes.name: Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Robin, I'm gonna ask the others to order ahead for us. What do you want?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I have a question.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Hm? What's wrong?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: If we find an injured cloudbeast, what should we do with it?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: (Moves head in curiosity)
attributes.name: Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Whoa, so cute! Can I touch it?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Yep.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Lighthouse's given it a checkup. Its injuries aren't serious. It'll get better after getting treatment on the landship.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Are you going to adopt it?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I... I don't know.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Cloudbeasts are social animals, and this area isn't a suitable habitat for them.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: It's probably here because it wandered off from its pack while they were migrating. It won't be easy to find them.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: We'll be working in this area for a while, so we can try to look for its pack. This is also fate, though. Perhaps you should think about adopting it.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I don't know if I can...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Didn't you say you haven't been living a very healthy lifestyle?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Maybe keeping a pet will help you get rid of your bad habits.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Robin, this here's an automatic feeder and water fountain that Katie used to use. It's yours if you want it.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: And take this pet food, too.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Wait, I thought Katie was a beckbeast?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Relax. This pet food is for both beckbeasts and cloudbeasts. Humans can eat it too. From what I heard, it's pretty darn good, too.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Have you tried it before?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Nope, haha.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Thâ€”Thanks.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: So, have you figured out what you want to call it yet?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Nâ€”Not yet...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I'm just taking care of it for now. I haven't decided to adopt it yet...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: That won't do. You two will be spending lots of time together.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Are you going to keep calling it 'cloudbeast'?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I'm not really good at coming up with names...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: How about we all come up with a name for this little fella, and you pick one?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Good idea!
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: What do you think, Robin?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: I... Yeah...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Oh, right, Lighthouse. You said I gotta give the little fella medicine, right? Iâ€”I'll head back and do that right now!
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: (Confused cry)
attributes.name: Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Sorry, I shouldn't have used you as an excuse.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: They probably think I'm hard to get along with.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: What do you think?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I don't think so.
attributes.name: Cloudbeast

attributes.content: They're all really kind people. You can tell, can't you? You're just guessing that's how they see you.
attributes.name: Cloudbeast

attributes.content: They're worried whether you can really take care of yourself and me at the same time. That's why they got all those pet supplies and started coming up with ideas for my name.
attributes.name: Cloudbeast

attributes.content: (Howls impatiently)
attributes.name: Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Yeah, I know I'm just guessing.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: This is how I am. I have such a negative view of everyone, just like how I have a negative view of myself.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: (Howls impatiently)
attributes.name: Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Are you hungry? It's time to eat.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: (Eats happily)
attributes.name: Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Can people really eat this?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Mm... Kinda salty.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: But it's actually pretty good.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: (Looks up in puzzlement)
attributes.name: Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Okay, okay. I won't eat your food. Enjoy your meal.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I'll get myself a cup of coffee.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Do you want coffee?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I'm not sure you can have any, though...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: (Cries with curiosity)
attributes.name: Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Okay... Just a little bit. It should be fine, right?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: The feeble cub walks up to Robin's coffee cup and cautiously licks the coffee.
(Walks away in disgust)
attributes.name: Cloudbeast

attributes.content: It doesn't taste good, right? Actually, I don't really like it myself.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: But somehow, before I knew it, I was already used to the taste.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Come, let's watch a movie together.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Robin wraps herself in her blanket and lets out a sigh.
Then, she makes some room for the cloudbeast cub to crawl inside.
(Cries with joy)
attributes.name: Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Welcome to my castle.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Sometimes, she feels that Rhodes Island is too big of a place, so much so that it makes her feel uncomfortable. She prefers smaller spaces, where she feels enveloped.
Before I was sent to Mansfield... I'd tuck myself into bed like this every evening after work.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I'd find a movie, watch it, then look up some reviews afterwards. Sometimes, I even watched analysis videos online. After that, I'd go to bed.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: And it'd be all the better if it was raining outside.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I love it when it rains. That way, I won't feel pressured to go outside, and I get to stay in bed feeling extra at ease.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: It's great when it's raining, don't you agree?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: But why do you look so lonely?
attributes.name: Cloudbeast

attributes.content: In the past, to make a living and to pay for my dad's treatment... I had to live this kind of life.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I'm used to loneliness.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Are you going to stay lonely forever?
attributes.name: Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Is... Is that not okay?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: This is Rhodes Island, not where you used to live. You have the choice to not be lonely.
attributes.name: Cloudbeast

attributes.content: As long as you wish for it.
attributes.name: Cloudbeast

attributes.content: A few days later...
We've been searching all over whenever we're out on mission the last couple days. We haven't found a cloudbeast nest.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Yeah, Robin, I think you should brace yourself. You could be in this for the long run.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Yep.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: If you can't bring yourself to say it, want me to tell her?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: You see, he...
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Hold on! Let me say it myself!
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Well... It's about the cloudbeast's name. I thought about it, and I was in over my head. I didn't consider that you might actually be fond of the idea, so...
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: No, actually, about that...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Do you guys have time after this?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: What's up?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Do you guys have time to come to my dorm room tomorrow to see the little fella and give it a name together?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Oh my! Of course!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Yeah, it ain't every day you invite us to do anything! I'm definitely coming!
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Yeah, I have a couple questions I wanted to ask you about keeping pets, too.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Haha, you can count on me!
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Catch, Hoppy!
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: (Howls excitedly)
attributes.name: Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Hey, Colin, I'm here for the little fella.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Hey, Robin!
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Thanks for playing with it while I was out on my mission.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I oughta thank it instead! I love playing with it!
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Did you just call it Hoppy?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Yep, I have a beckbeast back home called Poppy.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: And this one keeps hopping around. That's why I'm calling it Hoppy! Right, Hoppy?
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: (Confused cry)
attributes.name: Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Hoppy... That's a good name.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Robin, are you taking Hoppy back?
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Yep.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Okay, see you, Hoppy!
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Final checkâ€”Cleaning, done.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: The little fella's nest, done.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Simple decorations, done.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Invitation to Closure... sent.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Now I just gotta wait till everyone's here.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Okay, little fella. We gotta be at the top of our game today. Don't make the others worry about us, okay?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Robin holds the little fella in her arms and changes its bandages as she tells it what to do later and how she wants it to work with her.
Of course, she knows it can't actually understand her. Nonetheless, what they are about to do has her very excited.
Perhaps because she has gotten too absorbed in talking to the cloudbeast, by accident, she brushes the little fella's wounds.
(Shrieks angrily)
attributes.name: Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Ow, that hurt.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Sorry, little fella.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: The little fella doesn't respond to Robin, only leaping to the side.
For some reason, Robin feels the excitement she had just a moment ago dampen immediately.
In its place, she feels a shred of anxiety.
Guess I'll head to Medical...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: (Whispers) This doesn't mean anything.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: (Whispers) I'll go get my wound treated quickly and go back for the rest of the prep.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Robin, are you hurt?
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: Huh... Domma?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Crap...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Here you go.
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: I had a look at the cloudbeast's medical report. It doesn't have any viruses.
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: If you feel sick later, come pay me another visit.
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Then I'll get...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Robin, I don't think we've seen each other since we came to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: This's the first time.
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: Oh... Râ€”Right.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I looked for you a couple times, but you were never here.
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: I heard you signed a different contract to get treatment for your father, and you've been workin' very hard. I was worried maybe you'd forgotten me.
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: I'd never, Domma. Not a kind soul like you...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I... I'm just worried that... maybe you'd end up hating me.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: How could I? You helped Anthony so much when we broke out of that prison.
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: Besides, if you weren't there in Mansfield to encourage me, I wouldn't've had the courage to settle down here.
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: Anthony hasn't ever told you?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Told me what? All he said was that the escape likely wouldn't've worked out without you.
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: (Grinds teeth and grumble) Anthony, you prick...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Robin was actually in her dorm room the few times that Domma tried to visit. She simply pretended that she was away.
And every time she visited the Medical Department, she always checked if Domma was away.
She has actually imagined a number of situations of herself running into Domma as well as thought about what to say to her when that happens.
However, for better or worse, she has never actually run into Domma until now.
Robin, what's wrong?
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: Robin remembers how ambitious she was.
Right, she ought to be braver!
Domma, actually, back in the prison break, I betrayed Anthony. I almost cut his escape short. I almost killed him myself, even.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: He forgave me, but I haven't forgiven myself.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I've been really afraid to tell you this. You're such a kind soul, I thought maybe you would end up hating me if I told you.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Even so, I want to tell you. I'm not asking for your forgiveness. It's just that, only by telling you can I put my mind at ease... a little.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I could never hate you.
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: You had your reasons, didn't you? And we all got out and made it to Rhodes Island together. That alone's worth celebratin', no?
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: I invited a bunch of coworkers to come see the little fella today.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Do you want to come?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Robin. Robin?
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: Uh... yeah.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: It's nothing. Just that Anthony and I had some differences of opinion during our escape.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I see, but we all got out and made it to Rhodes Island together. That alone's worth celebratin', no?
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: Yep.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: When Anthony's back, let's all have a chat together.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Domma

attributes.content: You're so useless, Robin.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: *sob* Completely and utterly useless.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I know Domma will forgive me... That's how kind she is.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: She's so kind, she didn't even begin to suspect I've been avoiding her.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: But that's exactly why I can't bring myself to tell her.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: The anxiety in her is growing more intense.
Subconsciously, she walks toward the cloudbeast's nest in hopes of getting some sense of comfort from the baby.
Yet the cloudbeast is nowhere to be found.
Hey, little fella?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Little fella?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Over the last few days, she has gotten used to having a small little thing pop out whenever she calls out, but that isn't happening right now.
Did I forget to lock the door when I went to Medical...?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Robin immediately checks her automatic door, and finds a few strands of its hair at the door.
Robin, why are you running? What's wrong?
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Colin... Did the little fella... no, did Hoppy come look for you?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Hoppy? Nope. What's wrong?
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: I found its hair on my door, so...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: No, I mean... When I went to Medical, I didn't close the door...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Ahh... no, no...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Robin, here. Have some water.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Thanks...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Phew... You see, Hoppy ran out of my room. I'm looking for it now.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Did you see it come this way?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Nope.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Okay... I'll keep looking.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Huh? Wait up! Rhodes Island's a huge place! How long do you plan on looking?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Huh... Closure? How'd you...?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: I got your invitation, and I don't have anything to do today anyway, so I figured I'd come to your dorm room first to talk about which movie to watch, and then I saw you dashing out of your room.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Sorry, I was in such a hurry, I didn't see you...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Nah, I'm not trying to get you to apologize. What I'm saying is, you just gotta ask me for this kinda stuff.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You haven't forgotten who I am, right?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Who are you, lady?
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Uh... Alright, listen up, boy. The lady standing in front of you is Kazdel's genius engineer and the creator of Rhodes Islandâ€”Closure!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: But... I can't ask you to do this for me.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Come on, Robin. We put on four movie clubs together, plus we watched a dozen shit flicks together. And here I thought we're more than friends alreadyâ€”we're shit flick buddies.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Am I the only one who thinks that?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: What kind of relationship is that?
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Like, we watch shitty movies together. If you ever find some who's willing to watch shitty movies with you, that's a true friend, and you'd better treasure that friendship, kid.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Oh, okay...
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Of course I see you as a good friend. It's just... I don't ask others for help often, so I didn't think...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Alright, then remember to come to me next time. If you don't, that means you don't think of me as a friend.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: As she speaks, Closure uses her terminal and checks about a dozen surveillance cameras' footage. Finally, she finds the little fella's whereabouts.
Hm... Looks like it ran off to the bridge.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: The bridge...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Maybe it wanted some fresh air since it's been inside for so long.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Or maybe it misses its family.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Well, whatever you think, that ain't a safe place for a small animal. You'd better head on over there now.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: The training room isn't far away from the bridge. With Closure's guidance, Robin quickly made her way there.
There, the little fella is standing on a railing by the window, looking intently at the clouds faraway.
Do you miss home?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: (Tilts head in puzzlement)
attributes.name: Cloudbeast

attributes.content: Life on Rhodes Island is good. You won't go hungry, and there'll probably be a lot of people who'll treat you well here.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: But do you still want to go back to nature, where you belong?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Or do you want to stay here?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Robin tries to fantasize having a conversation with the little fella.
But she realizes she isn't able to.
I know. This is my decision to make.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: But I haven't even figured out what to do, so how could I imagine how you'd answer?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Sooner or later, we need to decide.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Hoppy!
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: (Leaps around in excitement)
attributes.name: Cloudbeast

attributes.content: The cloudbeast ignores Robin, and immediately brightens up upon seeing the ball in the boy's hand.
Little boy, looks like you're really good friends with the cloudbeast, too.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Yep, it's my good buddy!
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Considering how Robin is, forget about taking care of it, I'm more worried about her ending up dead.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Maybe you should take care of it instead.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Uh... I think that's up to Robin. Besides, I don't think it's important who takes care of it.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: I'll be happy as long as I can play with it every day.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: When she sees the little fella playing with the boy, Robin suddenly realizes that, aside from herself, the cloudbeast cub has already found a new friend onboard Rhodes Island.
But it is only now that she truly understands what that means: The little fella has a lot of choices open to it.
The choice that she tried to force on it does not actually exist in the first place.
Just like the choice that she's forcing on herself does not actually exist.
I brought it here, so I have a responsibility to take care of it or help it find a home.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Besides, everyone says that keeping pets can help you improve your lifestyle...
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: What? Robin!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You came to me at three in the morning last night to talk about that crap that Nian directed!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I can tell at a glance that you're not that kinda girl!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Robin stares, blank, for a spell.
Has she actually gotten used to this lifestyle because of her life's circumstances, or is that just the person she is?
Or is it perhaps both?
But... that's not a good thing.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: What's so bad about it? I've never had a proper work-life balance myself.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Yesterday, I slept through Engineering's meeting. Eunectes tore me a new one, but look, I'm still here.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: It's nobody's business! Haha!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Hearing Closure's nonchalant response, Robin finally understands just what the anxiety she feels is actually about.
She feels remorse for what happened during their escape from prison, and she wants to one day tell Domma the truth.
She feels bad for not asking Closure for help, and she wishes to one day become someone who can ask her friends for help.
She is thankful for her coworkers' kindness, and she looks forward to the day she can return the favor.

She wants, she wishes, and she looks forward. That is why she is unwilling to admit that who she is right now cannot achieve any of this. She can't make herself like that just because of a single idea.
She simply can't tell Domma, because she cannot cross that hurdle in her mind.
She simply doesn't think to ask her friends when she needs help, because she has little to no friends.
She simply doesn't know how to respond to the kindness of others, because she has never actually accepted their kindness.
These chaotic ideas made her try her hardest to deny her past lifestyle, to the point that she tried to force all this on a little cloudbeast.
But the truth is it might be exactly as Closure saysâ€”
You're right. It's nobody's business.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: That's my girl. If you had the time to worry about this stuff, you really should be figuring out what we should watch next.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Yep.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Robin, catch!
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: You should play with Hoppy too!
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Sorry, little fella. Let's play.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: (Howls happily)
attributes.name: Cloudbeast
